title: Down a long way: the story of an oilwell
creator_credit: Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films, British Petroleum and Bob Privett
brief_description: Light-hearted animation describes methods of finding oil. Geologists can deduce the presence of a favourable underground formation from surface observations, and the geophysicist can then site a well, with some accuracy, by plotting the actual shape of the underground strata. Describes drilling and sampling operations which give access to the imprisoned oil.
